de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail

Class jtail

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtail

  • public class jtail
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Gimleux

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int bytes 
      private java.lang.String[] content 
      private java.io.File file 
      private int lines 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      jtail(java.lang.String[] args)
      Complete Program:
      Prints last n bytes or lines (depending on args) of _filename_ in Console
      - if neither lines nor bytes are passed, lines get a default value of 10
      - if bytes as well as lines are passed, only lines will be used

      Analyses all passed arguments for a filename as well as a lines and bytes argument and calls the corresponding functions to store their values

      Gets Number of all bytes in passed file
      private int getNumberOfLinesInFile()
      Gets Number of all lines in passed file

      print stored data in Console
      private void readFile()
      stores last _n_ lines/bytes (depending on arguments)

      reads last _n_ (depending on arguments) lines/bytes (depending on arguments) of file and stores them
      private void setLinesIfNoArgs()

    • Constructor Detail

      • jtail

        public jtail(java.lang.String[] args)
      throws de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIllegalParameterException,
             de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIOException
        Complete Program:
        Prints last n bytes or lines (depending on args) of _filename_ in Console
        - if neither lines nor bytes are passed, lines get a default value of 10
        - if bytes as well as lines are passed, only lines will be used
        Parameters:
        args - _filename_ --lines=_n_ --bytes=_n_
        Throws:
        de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIllegalParameterException - No filename passed or _n_ !element of N+
        de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIOException - Errors in file reading

    • Method Detail

      • argContainsArg

        private int argContainsArg(java.lang.String element,
                           java.lang.String arg)
                    throws de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIllegalParameterException
        Checks if arguments were passed with right values and returns the value
        Parameters:
        element - single argument that contains wanted value
        arg - tells which kind of argument the function was called with
        Returns:
        value of the given argument
        Throws:
        de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIllegalParameterException - thrown if the argument's value is not element of N+

      • argContainsFile

        private void argContainsFile(java.lang.String element)
                      throws de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIllegalParameterException
        Verifies existence of passed file(name) and stores the file in attribute
        Parameters:
        element - single argument that seems to be a file(name)
        Throws:
        de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIllegalParameterException - thrown if more than one filename was passed

      • getArguments

        private boolean getArguments(java.lang.String[] args)
                      throws de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIllegalParameterException
        Analyses all passed arguments for a filename as well as a lines and bytes argument and calls the corresponding functions to store their values
        Parameters:
        args - argument passed in the call of the class/program
        Returns:
        true if arguments contain a filepath
        Throws:
        de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIllegalParameterException - No filename passed or _n_ !element of N+

        Returns:
        number of all bytes in file
        Throws:

               throws de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIOException

      • readLastInContentArray

        private void readLastInContentArray(int numberOfInFile,
                                    boolean lookingForLines)
                             throws de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIOException
        reads last _n_ (depending on arguments) lines/bytes (depending on arguments) of file and stores them
        Parameters:
        numberOfInFile - Number of all lines/bytes (depending on lookingForLines param) in file
        lookingForLines - true if whole lines shall be stores, false if only bytes shall be stored
        Throws:
        de.dhbwka.java.exercise.io.jtail.jtailIOException - thrown if file cannot be read

      • setLinesIfNoArgs

        private void setLinesIfNoArgs()
        Sets lines argument to default value of 10 if neither lines nor bytes are given
